Description: Painted wooden shabti of a Chantress of Amun Ast(?) with a black lappet-wig, a yellow modelled face with black traced features and a red and blue collar; the hands are unmarked; the front of the leg section is inscribed with a column of black painted Hieroglyphs.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
